front.title: A Unified Approach to Inter-Domain Routing

author.organization: IBM, T. J. Watson Research Center
University of Southern California (USC), Computer Science Department

abstract.t: This memo is an informational RFC which outlines one potential approach for inter-domain routing in future global internets. The focus is on scalability to very large networks and functionality, as well as scalability, to support routing in an environment of heterogeneous services, requirements, and route selection criteria.
